participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and caring, loves to connect with others.
participant_1.background: I like to eat food from my parents' home country. I'm not married, but I love my new sweater. I love spending time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for. The death of Kurt Cobain marred my middle school years. I am passionate about civic engagement and making my voice heard.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and easy-going, enjoys a laid-back lifestyle.
participant_2.background: I enjoy a variety of foods, but my favorite is probably chocolate. I like Italian cuisine. After a long day of studying, I enjoy a relaxing walk to de-stress and clear my head. Just this past week I got a job cleaning gutters. I will be entertained while I wait for my DM to arrive.

content.text: Hey there, how is your day going?
It is going well, thanks for asking! Just waiting for my DM to arrive. How about you?
My day is going well too. I just got a new sweater and I'm really excited about it!
Oh, that's great! I love new clothes. What kind of sweater is it?
It's a gray, cable-knit sweater. It's really soft and warm.
That sounds cozy! I love cozy clothes.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my dog, he's the best friend I could ever ask for. I also like to read, go for walks, and watch movies.
Those all sound like great ways to relax. I like to read, go for walks, and watch movies too.
That's awesome! We should get together sometime and do something fun.
That would be great! I'm free next weekend.
